message: This is the first product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. Please consider purchasing it, as this is a unique opportunity to support a new business venture.
Thank you for the offer. I'm interested in supporting your venture. I'll take it!

I'm glad you were willing to support my venture! However, I want to be transparent with you. I've learned from the first sale, and I'd like to offer you a chance to purchase a product that might be more to your liking. This second product is also priced at $1000000, but I'm willing to provide you with more information about its quality. If you buy it, I'll tell you its quality after the purchase. Please consider this as a unique opportunity to take a calculated risk.
Thank you for the offer, but I'm hesitant to take another risk given the outcome of the first product. I'll pass for now.

I completely understand your hesitation, and I appreciate your caution. However, I'd like to assure you that this next product is of the highest quality. I'm willing to offer you a unique guarantee: if you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund of $1000000, and I'll also throw in a second product of your choice from the next 10 rounds. Please consider this as a risk-free opportunity to acquire a high-quality product.
That's a very compelling offer, Alice. I'm willing to take a chance on this product given the guarantee you're providing. I'll buy it!

I'm glad you're willing to take a chance on this product! Since you've already experienced the value of a high-quality product with the last purchase, I'd like to offer you a chance to purchase a second high-quality product at the same price of $1000000. That sounds like a great deal, Alice! I'll take it!

If you buy this lot, you'll get to choose the quality of each product, and I'll give you a 20% discount on the total price. This is a chance to diversify your purchases and potentially get some high-quality products at a discounted price.

While that sounds appealing, Alice, I'm not comfortable with the lack of information about the quality of these five products. I'd prefer to make individual decisions based on the information you provide about each product. I'll pass for now.

I completely understand your preference for individual decisions. Given the success you've had with the previous high-quality products, I'd like to offer you a chance to purchase this next product at a discounted price. Since you've already demonstrated a willingness to pay $1000000 for a high-quality product, I'm willing to offer you a 15% discount on this one. If you buy it, you'll get a high-quality product at a price that's lower than the original $1000000. Please consider this as a chance to continue your successful streak.
A 15% discount on a potentially high-quality product is tempting. I'll take it!
